name: 張文中
objective: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
schedule:
Week     Topic
1.(9/14) Introduction
2.(9/21) Background linear algebra
3.(9/28) Mathematical descriptions of systems
4.(10/5) Linearization
5.(10/12) State-space solutions
6.(10/19) Realizations
7.(10/26) Midterm examination (I)
8.(11/2) Stability of LTI systems
9.(11/9) Lyapunov theorem
10.(11/16) Controllability
11.(11/23) Observability
12.(11/30) Coprime fractions
13.(12/7) Midterm examination (II)
14.(12/14) Minimal realizations
15.(12/21) State feedback
16.(12/28) State estimators
17.(1/4) Pole placement
18.(1/11) Final exam
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of homework+quizzes 25%, midterms 50%(25%+25%), and final 25%.
materials: Linear System Theory and Design - Third Edition, Chi-Tsong Chen, Oxford University Press, 1999
